title: The third dayes creation. By that most excellent, learned, and diuine poet, VVilliam, Lord Bartas. Done verse for verse out of the originall French by Thomas VVinter, Master of Arts
author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
